It processes account cancellations for these rates, identifies eligible refunds, updates relevant tables to reflect these refunds, and removes processed cancellation records. The procedure involves multiple steps, including data truncation, selection, insertion, updating, and deletion across several tables.

This stored procedure does not take any input parameters. It operates on the current state of the database tables involved.

-- =============================================
-- Author:		<Author,,Name>
-- Create date: <Create Date,,>
-- Description:	<Description,,>
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [ConEd].[usp_Upload_8_Process36Or40Refunds]
AS 
    BEGIN
	--
-- ********************************************************************
--	Handle Rate 036 or 040 refunds
-- ********************************************************************
        TRUNCATE TABLE ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds
--
--	Find all rate 036 account cancellations that are canceled for the current period.  Save their basic information that will be
--	used by the stored procedure (ConEd.usp_IdentifyRefundsForGasRate036).  It will net the following attributes:
--				
--				DeltaNumberOfPeriods will generally be 13.  The current month billing plus 12 refund months.
--				RefundCCF will probably be zero
--				RefundTherms will be negative and have a relationship as to the amount of money being refunded.
--				RefundBilledAmount is negative dollars representing the total amount 
--
        DECLARE @NumberOfConEdisonRate036Refunds INT
--
        SELECT  @NumberOfConEdisonRate036Refunds = COUNT(*) 
        SELECT  COUNT(*)
        FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellation
        WHERE   ( BillingPeriodRevision = BillingPeriod )
                AND ( TariffCode IN ( '036', '040' ) )
                AND ( DeltaNumberOfPeriods = 12
                      OR DeltaNumberOfPeriods = 13
                    )
--
        IF ( @NumberOfConEdisonRate036Refunds > 0 ) 
            BEGIN
                INSERT  INTO ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds
                        ( AccountNumber ,
                          TariffCode ,
                          DeltaNumberOfPeriods ,
                          BillingPeriodRevision ,
                          BillingPeriod ,
                          FromDate ,
                          ToDate ,
                          RefundCCF ,
                          RefundTherms ,
                          RefundBilledAmount
                        )
                        SELECT  AccountNumber ,
                                TariffCode ,
                                DeltaNumberOfPeriods ,
                                BillingPeriodRevision ,
                                BillingPeriod ,
                                FromDate ,
                                ToDate ,
                                CCF ,
                                Therms ,
                                BilledAmount
                        FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellation
                        WHERE   ( BillingPeriodRevision = BillingPeriod )
                                AND ( TariffCode IN ( '036', '040' ) )
                                AND ( DeltaNumberOfPeriods = 12
                                      OR DeltaNumberOfPeriods = 13
                                    )

                SELECT  'ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds' AS description ,
                        *
                FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds
--
--		The identified account(s) are stored in th ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds table.  
--		The ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationPreload and ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellation have their Therms and CCF set to zero in EBCDIC and ascii 
--		format respectively.  This way forces the stored procedure (ConEd.usp_IdentifyRefundsForGasRate036) to process them as refunds.
--
--		This was a critical correction factor "(DeltaNumberOfPeriods = 12)". This isolates the annualized refund for gas rates 036 & 040.  (9/11/2009 pah)
--

                UPDATE  ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationPreload
                SET     Therms = '0000000{' ,
                        CCF = '0000000{'
                WHERE   ( BillingPeriodRevision = BillingPeriodRevision )
                        AND ( TariffCode IN ( '036', '040' ) )
                        AND ( (DeltaNumberOfPeriods = 12
                              OR DeltaNumberOfPeriods = 13)
                            )
				
                UPDATE  ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellation
                SET     Therms = 0 ,
                        CCF = 0
                WHERE   ( BillingPeriodRevision = BillingPeriod )
                        AND ( TariffCode IN ( '036', '040' ) )
                        AND ( (DeltaNumberOfPeriods = 12
                              OR DeltaNumberOfPeriods = 13)
                            )
				
                UPDATE  ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned
                SET     CancelCCF = 0 ,
                        CancelTherms = 0
                WHERE   ( BillingPeriodRevision = BillingPeriod )
                        AND ( CancelTariffCode IN ( '036', '040' ) )
                        AND ( (DeltaNumberOfPeriods = 12
                              OR DeltaNumberOfPeriods = 13)
                            )

            END
  

        DECLARE @GasRate036RefundCount INT
--
        SELECT  @GasRate036RefundCount = ISNULL(COUNT(*), 0)
        FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary
                INNER JOIN ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountSummary ON ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.BillingPeriod = ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountSummary.BillingPeriod
                                                              AND ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.BillingPeriodRevision = ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountSummary.BillingPeriodRevision
                                                              AND ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.OriginalAccountNumber = ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountSummary.OriginalAccountNumber
        WHERE   ( ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelTotalCCF = 0 )
                AND ( ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelTotalTherms = 0 )
                AND ( ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.TotalCanceledAmount <> 0 )
                AND ( ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.GasRateCode IN (
                      '036', '040' ) )

--	One Period Refund
--
        IF ( @GasRate036RefundCount <> 0 ) 
            BEGIN
	--
	--	Note:	The workflow has the UploadConEdisonAccountSummary (Rebilled data) loaded into the ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas
	--			prior to working on the cancellation data.  The correction is being applied to the ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas
	--			instead of the ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountSummary.
	--	
                UPDATE  ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas
                SET     Notes = CAST(ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.TotalRebilledAmount
                        + ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.RefundBilledAmount AS VARCHAR(18))
                        + ' net Charge for rate '
                        + ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.GasRateCode
                        + ' for the Current period ('
                        + ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.BillingPeriod
                        + ') net rebilled amount: '
                        + CAST(ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.TotalRebilledAmount AS VARCHAR(18))
                        + ' refunded amount: '
                        + CAST(ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.RefundBilledAmount AS VARCHAR(18))
                        + ' refunded Therms(CCF): '
                        + CAST(ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.RefundTherms AS VARCHAR(18))
                        + '('
                        + CAST(ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.RefundCCF AS VARCHAR(18))
                        + ')' ,
                        TotalRebilledAmount = ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.TotalRebilledAmount
                        + ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.RefundBilledAmount ,
                        TotalCanceledAmount = 0 ,
                        TotalCCF = TotalCCF
                        + ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.RefundCCF ,
                        TotalTherms = TotalTherms
                        + ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.RefundTherms ,
                        CancelTotalTherms = 0 ,
                        CancelTotalCCF = 0
                FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas
                        INNER JOIN ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds ON ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.BillingPeriod = ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.BillingPeriod
                                                              AND ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.BillingPeriodRevision = ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.BillingPeriodRevision
                                                              AND ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.OriginalAccountNumber = ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.AccountNumber
                                                              AND ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.GasRateCode = ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.TariffCode
    --
	--    Once the refund is applied correctly to the ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.  The cancellation record will be removed.
	--
                DELETE  FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary
                FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary
                        INNER JOIN ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountSummary ON ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.BillingPeriod = ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountSummary.BillingPeriod
                                                              AND ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.BillingPeriodRevision = ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountSummary.BillingPeriodRevision
                                                              AND ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.OriginalAccountNumber = ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountSummary.OriginalAccountNumber
                WHERE   ( ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelTotalCCF = 0 )
                        AND ( ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelTotalTherms = 0 )
                        AND ( ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.TotalCanceledAmount <> 0 )
                        AND ( ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.GasRateCode IN (
                              '036', '040' ) )
                        AND ( ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.NumberOfBillingPeriods = 12 )
	--
                SET @GasRate036RefundCount = 0

            END
--
        SELECT  @GasRate036RefundCount = ISNULL(COUNT(*), 0)
        FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned
                INNER JOIN ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountSummary ON ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned.BillingPeriod = ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountSummary.BillingPeriod
                                                              AND ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned.BillingPeriodRevision = ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountSummary.BillingPeriodRevision
                                                              AND ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned.AccountNumber = ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountSummary.OriginalAccountNumber
        WHERE   ( ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned.CancelCCF = 0 )
                AND ( ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned.CancelTherms = 0 )
                AND ( ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned.CancelBilledAmount <> 0 )
                AND ( ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountSummary.GasRateCode IN (
                      '036', '040' ) )
--
--	Spanned Refund
--
        IF ( @GasRate036RefundCount <> 0 ) 
            BEGIN
	--
	--	Note:	The workflow has the UploadConEdisonAccountSummary (Rebilled data) loaded into the ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas
	--			prior to working on the cancellation data.  The correction is being applied to the ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas
	--			instead of the ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountSummary.
	--			
                UPDATE  ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas
                SET     Notes = CAST(ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.TotalRebilledAmount
                        + ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.RefundBilledAmount AS VARCHAR(18))
                        + ' net Charge for rate '
                        + ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.GasRateCode
                        + ' for the Current period ('
                        + ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.BillingPeriod
                        + ') net rebilled amount: '
                        + CAST(ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.TotalRebilledAmount AS VARCHAR(18))
                        + ' refunded amount: '
                        + CAST(ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.RefundBilledAmount AS VARCHAR(18))
                        + ' refunded Therms(CCF): '
                        + CAST(ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.RefundTherms AS VARCHAR(18))
                        + '('
                        + CAST(ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.RefundCCF AS VARCHAR(18))
                        + ')' ,
                        TotalRebilledAmount = ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.TotalRebilledAmount
                        + ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.RefundBilledAmount ,
                        TotalCanceledAmount = 0 ,
                        TotalCCF = TotalCCF
                        + ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.RefundCCF ,
                        TotalTherms = TotalTherms
                        + ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.RefundTherms ,
                        CancelTotalTherms = 0 ,
                        CancelTotalCCF = 0
                FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas
                        INNER JOIN ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds ON ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.BillingPeriod = ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.BillingPeriod
                                                              AND ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.BillingPeriodRevision = ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.BillingPeriodRevision
                                                              AND ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.OriginalAccountNumber = ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.AccountNumber
                                                              AND ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.GasRateCode = ConEd.UploadConEdisonRate036Refunds.TariffCode
	--
	--	Once the refund is applied correctly to the ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas.  The cancellation record will be removed.
	--
                DELETE  FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned
                FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned
                        INNER JOIN ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountSummary ON ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned.BillingPeriod = ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountSummary.BillingPeriod
                                                              AND ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned.BillingPeriodRevision = ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountSummary.BillingPeriodRevision
                                                              AND ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned.AccountNumber = ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountSummary.OriginalAccountNumber
                WHERE   ( ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned.CancelCCF = 0 )
                        AND ( ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned.CancelTherms = 0 )
                        AND ( ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned.CancelBilledAmount <> 0 )
                        AND ( ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned.CancelTariffCode IN (
                              '036', '040' ) ) 
	--
                SET @GasRate036RefundCount = 0

            END


		          
    END
